trends: There have been 18 other sightings in North Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in North Las Vegas on or around October 18th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving north on Near Decatur and Elkhorn at 7:00pm when I observed four amber lights in the sky appear and disappear one by one as they were traveling north towards the mountains. the sky was clear; the sun had already set and there were no airplanes in the sky.
Summary: I observed 3-4 amber to orange lights in the sky at 6:57pm turning on and off while i drove my vehicle on north decatur
